name: The Rabbit Hole Remastered
description: You find yourself in a strange place, a place full of darkness and mad things. After falling down the rabbit hole, what mysteries lies beyond? Are you ready to escape it? Be fast, be smart and survive this grim reality! Now Remastered!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: This game requires an VR headset, One USB 2.0 or faster port, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2, or better
